code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Modal=_ref=>{let{job,onClose,onUpdate}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState(job.title);const[description,setDescription]=useState(job.description);const[client,setClient]=useState(job.client);const[status,setStatus]=useState(job.status);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onUpdate({...job,title,description,client,status});onClose();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Editar Job"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:client,onChange:e=>setClient(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:status,onChange:e=>setStatus(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"pending",children:"Pendente"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"approved",children:"Aprovado"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"rejected",children:"Rejeitado"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Atualizar Job"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onClose,children:"Fechar"})]});};export default Modal;
